text: Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 15. I will not go swinging my body in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๑๕. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่โยกกายไปในละแวกบ้าน”
15. I shall not go fidgetting (swaggering, staggering) the body in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
